data.message:
I am extremely frustrated and keep getting the runaround with my Facebook account 5  days ago it became disabled it said that I was committing fraud when I was altering a price of my wedding dress that I was trying to sell and Facebook has disabled my account and now I can no longer access it.
I have spoken to many people from FB but nobody will help me they keep telling me to go to the help center and that is literally no help at all NOBODY is helping me with my Facebook
